name: part_007
file: tmp_【お悩み解決】ライブに向けてねぽらぼが悩みを解決するそうです【#ねぽらぼに願いを】 [ChjB-b_MPcY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Wrapping up the first concern about motivation, with Lamy praying and others shouting to rest.
Introduction and reading of the second concern regarding stress relief for a friend.
The members discuss their personal methods for relieving stress.
Nene summarizes a combined stress relief method for the viewer.
Moving to the third concern about anger management and methods to calm down.

subtitles.original: ね。
subtitles.english: Right?

subtitles.original: なんだろう、解決しますように。
subtitles.english: I hope... it gets resolved.

subtitles.original: しますように。
subtitles.english: I hope so.

subtitles.original: 常に80%で生きていけ。
subtitles.english: Always live your life at 80%.

subtitles.original: までも大事よね、それね。
subtitles.english: But that is important, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 休みは大事！
subtitles.english: Rest is important!

subtitles.original: 休め！寝ろ！
subtitles.english: Rest! Sleep!

subtitles.original: 休めー！
subtitles.english: Rest!

subtitles.original: 元気なんだよなー。
subtitles.english: They're so energetic.

subtitles.original: ということで。
subtitles.english: And with that...

subtitles.original: はい、次の。
subtitles.english: Yes, the next...

subtitles.original: お悩みはこちら。
subtitles.english: concern is this one.

subtitles.original: ファンネーム：wadachi(本物)@あくあクルー
subtitles.english: Fan Name: wadachi(Real)@AquaCrew

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: ということで、じゃあ誰読もうか？ねねさんいきますか？
subtitles.english: And so, who should read it? Nene-san, will you go?

subtitles.original: えー、ファンネーム、wadachi
subtitles.english: Um, fan name, wadachi...

subtitles.original: あくあクルーの方からいただきました。
subtitles.english: ...from an Aqua Crew member.

subtitles.original: あくあクルー？
subtitles.english: Aqua Crew?

subtitles.original: あくあクルー？あくあクルー？
subtitles.english: Aqua Crew? Aqua Crew?

subtitles.original: ねぽらぼのみなさん、こんばんはー！
subtitles.english: Everyone in Nepolabo, good evening!

subtitles.original: あ、まねしてるー！こんばんは！
subtitles.english: Oh, she's imitating her! Good evening!

subtitles.original: ちゃんとしてる！リスペクトだよ！
subtitles.english: I'm doing it properly! It's out of respect!

subtitles.original: リア友がすごくストレスを抱えて悩んでいるのですが、
subtitles.english: My real-life friend is suffering from a lot of stress and is troubled,

subtitles.original: ねぽらぼのみなさんはどうやってストレスを発散していますか？
subtitles.english: how do you members of Nepolabo relieve your stress?

subtitles.original: 教えていただけると幸いです。
subtitles.english: I would appreciate it if you could tell me.

subtitles.original: なるほど。
subtitles.english: I see.

subtitles.original: じゃ、これはストレス発散方法。
subtitles.english: Well then, stress relief methods.

subtitles.original: 一人ずつ言っていこうか。ねね、ストレス。
subtitles.english: Let's go around one by one. Nene, stress?

subtitles.original: ねね、ストレス、え、暴飲暴食！
subtitles.english: Nene, stress... uh, binge eating and drinking!

subtitles.original: 体に良くない。
subtitles.english: That's not good for the body.

subtitles.original: でも大事！たまに！たまにやるには。
subtitles.english: But it's important! Occasionally! Doing it occasionally...

subtitles.original: いいんじゃない？暴飲暴食。
subtitles.english: ...is fine, isn't it? Binge eating and drinking.

subtitles.original: いいと思います。すごいスッキリします。
subtitles.english: I think so. It's very refreshing.

subtitles.original: ポルカさんがなんか「そうじゃないんだよな」みたいな顔してたけど。
subtitles.english: Polka-san had a look like, "That's not quite it."

subtitles.original: 「あ、違うな」みたいな顔があったけど。
subtitles.english: She had a face like, "Oh, that's different."

subtitles.original: ポルカさんはちなみに何なんですか？
subtitles.english: What about you, Polka-san?

subtitles.original: 物欲解放！
subtitles.english: Unleashing my material desires!

subtitles.original: 一緒だよ！結局一緒じゃねえかよ！
subtitles.english: That's the same! It's the same thing in the end!

subtitles.original: なんでちょっと「違うな」みたいな顔してたんだよ。
subtitles.english: Why did you make that "It's different" face then?

subtitles.original: ラミィは？ラミィは？
subtitles.english: What about Lamy? Lamy?

subtitles.original: ラミィはね、あの、さっきみんなで話してたけど、
subtitles.english: For Lamy, well, we were all talking about this earlier, but...

subtitles.original: あの、バカバカしい話をする。
subtitles.english: ...talking about ridiculous things.

subtitles.original: 友達いなかったらキツいよ。
subtitles.english: That's tough if you don't have friends.

subtitles.original: 普段から結構真面目なことをいろいろ考えて爆発しがちなので、
subtitles.english: I tend to think about serious things all the time and almost explode,

subtitles.original: 頭空っぽにして。
subtitles.english: so emptying my head...

subtitles.original: あー、なるほどね。さっきもお友達としゃべってた。
subtitles.english: Ah, I see. You were talking with your friends just now.

subtitles.original: 会話の内容、言うな、言うな！
subtitles.english: The content of that conversation... don't say it, don't say it!

subtitles.original: みたいなのも、ストレス解消になるかなと思います。はい！
subtitles.english: That kind of thing is also stress relief, I think. Yes!

subtitles.original: 私のね、ストレス発散はね、寝る。
subtitles.english: For me, my stress relief is sleeping.

subtitles.original: あー、大事！
subtitles.english: Ah, that's important!

subtitles.original: 次の日になってたら結構忘れてるときあるから。
subtitles.english: By the next day, there are times when I've mostly forgotten about it.

subtitles.original: 忘れる！大事！寝るは大事！時間は大事だと思うよ。
subtitles.english: You forget! It's important! Sleeping is important! Time is key, I think.

subtitles.original: 寝不足なときもさ、思考回路がフワフワして、変なこと考えちゃったりとかもするもんね。
subtitles.english: When you're sleep-deprived, your thought process gets fuzzy and you think weird things, right?

subtitles.original: そうそう。考えすぎちゃうんだよね。ぐっすり寝る。
subtitles.english: Exactly. You overthink things. Sleep soundly.

subtitles.original: なんか今日「寝る」多い、解決方法。
subtitles.english: There's a lot of "sleeping" today as a solution.

subtitles.original: 寝るって大事なんだな。今日、ねぽらぼ解決するよ、寝れば！
subtitles.english: Sleeping is important. Today, Nepolabo will solve everything... if you just sleep!

subtitles.original: ということで、じゃあ、ねねさんまとめてください。
subtitles.english: So, Nene-san, please summarize.

subtitles.original: えーっと、wadachiさんは今日からストレスが溜まったら、
subtitles.english: Um, wadachi-san, from today, if you feel stressed,

subtitles.original: 暴飲暴食をして、物欲をすべて解放して、
subtitles.english: binge eat and drink, unleash all your material desires,

subtitles.original: 寝ながら、内容ゼロの話をしてください。頑張ろうねー！
subtitles.english: and while sleeping, talk about absolutely nothing. Do your best!

subtitles.original: やばい人だよそれ！できますように！
subtitles.english: That's a crazy person! Hope you can do it!

subtitles.original: はい！ということでね、次のお悩みはこちら！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so, the next concern is this one!

subtitles.original: ちょっとした悩みなのですが、怒りが込み上げてきた際に落ち着かせる方法は何かありますか？
subtitles.english: This is just a small concern, but what are some ways to calm down when anger starts welling up?

subtitles.original: じゃ、おまるさん読んでください。あ、ししろ推しだ！
subtitles.english: Then, Omaru-san, please read it. Oh, it's a Shishiro fan!

subtitles.original: じゃ、ぼたんが読もう。シキシキ、ししろ大好きなSSRBさん。はい！
subtitles.english: Then Botan should read it. Shiki-shiki, Shishiro-loving SSRB-san. Yes!

subtitles.original: ちょっとした悩みなのですが、怒りが込み上げてきた際に落ち着かせる方法は何がありますか？
subtitles.english: This is just a small concern, but what are some ways to calm down when anger starts welling up?

subtitles.original: 俺の右手がうずくぜー！動いてる！
subtitles.english: My right hand is throbbing! It's moving!

subtitles.original: はい、ねねさん。
subtitles.english: Yes, Nene-san.

subtitles.original: え、使い古してボロボロになったタオルを切り刻む！
subtitles.english: Uh, shredding up an old, worn-out towel!

subtitles.original: ちょっとガチ。闇深い。やめろやめろ。
subtitles.english: That's a bit too real. It's dark. Stop it, stop it.

subtitles.original: ねね、なんかもう使わない割れかけの食器とかも割りそうじゃない？
subtitles.english: Nene seems like she'd break cracked dishes she doesn't use anymore, doesn't she?

subtitles.original: あ、でも、あるからね、そういう施設ね。
subtitles.english: Ah, but those kinds of facilities do exist.

subtitles.original: ゴミになってしまった食器を割る場所があるんですよ。
subtitles.english: There are places where you can break dishes that have become trash.

subtitles.original: おもしろそうな場所あるじゃん。人気すぎて予約取れないんだって。
subtitles.english: That sounds like an interesting place. Apparently, it's so popular you can't get a reservation.

subtitles.original: シキシキの子、ねねさんちょっと溜まってますよ！シキシキのことを思い出して！
subtitles.english: Shiki-shiki-kun, Nene-san is a bit pent up! Remember Shiki-shiki!

subtitles.original: ということで、ねねちゃん、後でお悩み聞くわ。
subtitles.english: So, Nene-chan, I'll listen to your troubles later.

subtitles.original: 後で暴飲暴食しようね。バカ話しようね。
subtitles.english: Let's binge eat and drink later. Let's talk about stupid things.

subtitles.original: で、なんだっけ？怒り！
subtitles.english: And, what was it? Anger!

subtitles.original: え、でも、ラミィがあんまり怒り...
subtitles.english: Well, but Lamy doesn't really feel anger...

subtitles.original: 確かにラミィ怒ってないな。
subtitles.english: It's true, Lamy doesn't get angry.

subtitles.original: わかんない、ごめん、わかんないかも。
subtitles.english: I don't know, sorry, I might not know.

subtitles.original: じゃ、怒りが沸かない方法は？逆に。
subtitles.english: Then, how about a way to not get angry? On the contrary.

subtitles.original: 心を広く持つ。
subtitles.english: Having a broad mind.

subtitles.original: 同じ同じ。ポルカも怒んないから、心を広く持つしかないと思う。
subtitles.english: Same here. Polka doesn't get angry either, so I think you just have to have a broad mind.

subtitles.original: その「広く持つ」って具体的にどうしたらいいんですか？
subtitles.english: How exactly do you go about "having a broad mind"?

subtitles.original: 別に、ちっぽけなことですから。宇宙とか銀河系規模で見たら。
subtitles.english: Well, it's just a trivial matter. If you look at it on the scale of the universe or the galaxy...

subtitles.original: おまるんっていつも銀河規模で見てたん？宇宙の規模から？
subtitles.english: Omarun, were you always looking at things on a galactic scale? From a cosmic perspective?

subtitles.original: 違うよ、自分のことは「ああやっちゃったな」とか...
subtitles.english: No, for my own things I just think "Oh, I messed up again"...
